inged helms were enchanted helmets that made its wearer fleet of foot in the 15 century DR.
These helms boosted the wearers speed and subtly improved their intelligence.
In the 15 century DR, winged helms could be found among bandits and heroes of the Sword Mountains, in the city of Neverwinter, the cultists of a beholder eye of flame who laired in the Crags, and in the hands of the vampire lord Ozit from the ruins of Illefarn.
